description: This pistachio tiffin looks impressive but is actually very simple to make.
name: Chocolate & Pistachio Tiffin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a baking tin with a little butter and line with parchment paper. Melt the butter, caster sugar, cocoa powder and golden syrup in a large saucepan on medium heat.
Mix in the biscuits, pistachios and dried cranberries and pour into the prepared tin, smoothing out with a spatula.
Melt the milk and dark chocolate in a large bowl in the microwave in 30 second bursts and pour over the mix in the tin, smoothing out with a spatula.
Chill in the fridge for 2 hours to set, slice into 15 pieces with a warmed knife and serve.
